00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct File *fic;
00028     unsigned char buf[1];
00029     struct List *list, *cell;
00030  
00031     adfEnvInitDefault();
00032 
00033     /* create and mount one device */
00034     hd = adfCreateDumpDevice("newdev", 80, 2, 11);
00035     if (!hd) {
00036         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00037         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00038     }
00039 
00040     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00041 
00042     if (adfCreateFlop( hd, "empty", FSMASK_FFS|FSMASK_DIRCACHE )!=RC_OK) {
00043         fprintf(stderr, "can't create floppy\n");
00044         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00045         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00046     }
00047 
00048     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00049     if (!vol) {
00050         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00051         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00052         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00053     }
00054 
00055     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00056 
00057     fic = adfOpenFile(vol, "file_1a","w");
00058     if (!fic) { adfUnMount(vol); adfUnMountDev(hd); adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1); }
00059     adfWriteFile(fic,1,buf);
00060     adfCloseFile(fic);
00061 
00062     fic = adfOpenFile(vol, "file_24","w");
00063     if (!fic) { adfUnMount(vol); adfUnMountDev(hd); adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1); }
00064     adfWriteFile(fic,1,buf);
00065     adfCloseFile(fic);
00066 
00067     fic = adfOpenFile(vol, "dir_1a","w");
00068     if (!fic) { adfUnMount(vol); adfUnMountDev(hd); adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1); }
00069     adfWriteFile(fic,1,buf);
00070     adfCloseFile(fic);
00071 
00072     fic = adfOpenFile(vol, "dir_5u","w");
00073     if (!fic) { adfUnMount(vol); adfUnMountDev(hd); adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1); }
00074     adfWriteFile(fic,1,buf);
00075     adfCloseFile(fic);
00076 
00077     puts("Create file_1a, file_24, dir_1a, dir_5u (with this order)");
00078 
00079     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00080     while(cell) {
00081         printEntry(cell->content);
00082         cell = cell->next;
00083     }
00084     adfFreeDirList(list);
00085 
00086     putchar('\n');
00087 
00088     puts("Rename dir_5u into file_5u");
00089 
00090     adfRenameEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "dir_5u", vol->curDirPtr, "file_5u");
00091 
00092     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00093     while(cell) {
00094         printEntry(cell->content);
00095         cell = cell->next;
00096     }
00097     adfFreeDirList(list);
00098 
00099     putchar('\n');
00100 
00101     puts("Rename file_1a into dir_3");
00102 
00103     adfRenameEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr,"file_1a", vol->curDirPtr,"dir_3");
00104 
00105     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00106     while(cell) {
00107         printEntry(cell->content);
00108         cell = cell->next;
00109     }
00110     adfFreeDirList(list);
00111 
00112     puts("Create dir_5u, Rename dir_3 into toto");
00113 /*
00114     fic = adfOpenFile(vol, "dir_5u","w");
00115     if (!fic) { adfUnMount(vol); adfUnMountDev(hd); adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1); }
00116     adfWriteFile(fic,1,buf);
00117     adfCloseFile(fic);
00118 */
00119     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_5u");
00120 
00121     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00122     while(cell) {
00123         printEntry(cell->content);
00124         cell = cell->next;
00125     }
00126     adfFreeDirList(list);
00127 
00128     adfRenameEntry(vol, vol->curDirPtr,"dir_1a", vol->curDirPtr,"longfilename");
00129 
00130     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00131     while(cell) {
00132         printEntry(cell->content);
00133         cell = cell->next;
00134     }
00135     adfFreeDirList(list);
00136 
00137     adfUnMount(vol);
00138     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00139 
00140     adfEnvCleanUp();
00141 
00142     return 0;
00143 }
